title: Stuck Logging On
body: When I try to log in to the client, it authenticates and continues to logging on phase, but then does not log me on and gets stuck in this phase until I close the client and relig, thus starting the process all over again. Been doing this for 30 minutes now, any ideas?

replies.body:
During login, there are a number of connections and security checks that happen. If any of these somehow don't go through properly, you'll fail to login. The guide that Rineyy linked earlier goes over the most common solutions and is a great first step in troubleshooting this issue.

If you still have login problems after taking the steps from that guide, please let me know.

We definitely don’t want you to miss the party, so here’s the security pass to the [Login Platform.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)


http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4hsbxlb85qU/VRqK0_slEZI/AAAAAAAAnDE/bBjnYxLhpOs/s1600/AmumuLoadScreen_8.png
